metadata.name: Automatic Portrait #1
metadata.description:
Internal landscapes spill to the outside. Skin and thought become one.  The self solidifies. 
1/1 NFT. 2D frame by frame mixed with 3D animation. 
The first collector of this NFT will also receive the original 31” x 39” oil on canvas. ==> https://www.instagram.com/p/CZKj7pbMr05/
